name: mikroe.click.se051plugntrust
short_description: SE051 Plug&Trust Click is a compact add-on board representing a ready-to-use IoT security solution. This board features the SE051C2, an updatable extension of the EdgeLockâ„¢ SE050 from NXP Semiconductor, which delivers proven security certified to CC EAL 6+, with AVA_VAN.5up to the OS level. Designed for the latest IoT security requirements, it allows securely storing and provisioning credentials performing cryptographic operations, giving edge-to-cloud security capability right out of the box. It also provides upgrade functionality of the IoT applet while preserving on-device credentials, alongside reconfiguration possibility.
